title: Ticket #3583: Perl Test for Schedd Soap Interface
description:
Perl Schedd Soap Interface Test

soap_api_test_schedd.run

The largest issue was how to have a SOAP we could use for the test. We decided to use SOAP-Lite-0.715 for now for our Perl based SOAP. So after using wget to extract the sources from our externals location we build and install the Perl modules into the folder we are running in. Then we edit the script we will run to test so it is looking at this freshly installed SOAP-Lite.

The personal HTCondor configures the SOAP interfaces in HTCondor.

The schedd port is discovered by finding the htcondor log directory and then parsing the port out of the first line in the ".schedd_address" file.
